participant_1.name: Mia
participant_1.personality: Creative and active, Mia loves to enjoy life while embracing her quirks.
participant_1.background: I get to be creative and have fun with my work. I am a hard worker who enjoys being active but struggles with weight loss. I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables. I stayed home with my cat, Leroy Jenkins, for my birthday. I like to attend wine tours.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and adventurous, Jake takes pride in his independence and enjoys the great outdoors.
participant_2.background: My sister-in-law said I was a lazy bum because I never had to work, but she doesn't know that I spend my days running my family business. The weather is not usually a factor when I am outside looking for wildlife. I'm just trying to live my life and be myself, and I enjoy country music, tattoos, and iced tea. I'm single and enjoy my freedom to drive around with the wind in my hair. I love my impala.

content.text: Thanks! Same to you! What are you up to today?
I'm taking a relaxing day at home. I just got back from a wine tour and I'm feeling pretty good.
That sounds fun! I'm a little jealous. I'm actually running errands today. I run my family business, so it's always something.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of business do you run?
It's a small hunting and fishing supply store. I love it, but it can be a lot of work.
That sounds like a really fun business! I've always been interested in hunting and fishing.
It's great! I get to be outside all day, and I meet a lot of interesting people.
That's awesome! I'm a little more of a city girl, but I can appreciate the outdoors.
Oh yeah, I'm not a city person at all. I love being in the woods.
I guess we're opposites then! But that's okay, we can still be friends.
Haha, absolutely! We can bond over our love of wine!
Sounds like a plan! I'm going to go open a bottle of wine now.
Sounds good! I'm going to go check on my inventory.
